text: Palomar College is a community college that is in San Diego County, California, United States. The main campus is in San Marcos, and the others are in Escondido, Camp Pendleton, Mt. Carmel High School, Fallbrook High School, Pauma Indian Reservation and at Ramona High School. A proposal in 2006 allowed millions of dollars to be given to the school from the state of California. There are currently 26,606 students at the college (2014). == Academics == Palomar College has more than 250 associate's degree and certificate programs, and also offers students transfer programs, which would allow them to go to different four-year universities. Below is a list of the programs that are being offered at the college * Arts, Media, Business, and Computer Science **Business Administration **Communications Department **Computer Science and Information Systems Department **Graphic Communications Department **Performing Arts Department *Career, Technical, and Extended Education **Cooperative Education Department **Design and Consumer Education Department **Emergency Medical Education Department **Occupational and Noncredit Programs **Public Safety Programs **Trade and Industry Department *Languages and Literature **English Department **English as a Second Language Department **Reading Services Program **Speech Communication / Forensics / ASL Department **World Languages Department ***Arabic ***Chinese ***Foreign languages ***French ***German ***Italian ***Japanese ***Spanish *Mathematics and the Natural and Health Sciences **Chemistry Department **Dental Assisting Program **Earth, Space, and Aviation Sciences Department **Life Sciences Department **Mathematics Department **Nursing Education **Physics/Engineering Department *Social and Behavioral Sciences **American Indian Studies Department **Behavioral Sciences Department **Child Development Department **Economics/History/Political Science Department **Kinesiology, Health, and Recreation Department **Library **Multicultural Studies Department **Tutoring == Other websites == * Official website * Palomar College club list == References == Category:California Community Colleges Category:San Diego County, California
title: Palomar College
